title: Avatar
overview: A marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious Titanic.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth’s mightiest heroes must come together to fight an alien invasion.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity’s survival.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: A vigilante fights crime in Gotham while facing his greatest foe.
